import React, { useState } from "react"; const Contact = () => { const FormSubmit = () => {}; const [data, setData] = useState({ fullname: "", email: "", phone: "", message: "", }); const InputEvent = (event) => { const { fullname1, email1, phone1, message1 } = event.target; setData((val, arr) => { val.fullname = fullname1; val.email = email1; val.phone = phone1; val.message = message1; }); }; return ( <>

); }; export default Contact;
